services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: Explore the range of tarot readings we offer.

general.title: General Reading
general.description: A broad overview of your current energy. Perfect for when you don't have a specific question.

love.title: Love & Relationship Reading
love.description: Focuses on romantic relationships (partner, ex, potential). Explores energies, loyalty, and future prospects.

career.title: Career & Business Reading
career.description: Guidance on career direction, job choices, and business opportunities. Ideal for career transitions.

finance.title: Finance Reading
finance.description: Insights into your financial energy, opportunities, expenses, and investments. Can include actionable advice.

spiritual.title: Spiritual & Healing Reading
spiritual.description: Examines your aura, karma, past lives, and inner energy. For self-reflection and emotional healing.

yesNo.title: Yes or No Reading
yesNo.description: A straightforward answer to a single, specific question. Quick, simple, and perfect for express services.

timeBased.title: Time-based Reading
timeBased.description: Energy forecast for the week, month, or year. See what's ahead for a specific period.

ppf.title: Past-Present-Future Reading
ppf.description: Highlights influences from your past, your current situation, and a forecast of what's to come.

soulmate.title: Soulmate / Twin Flame Reading
soulmate.description: Explores soul connections, spiritual relationships, and destined partners.

chakra.title: Chakra or Energy Reading
chakra.description: Assesses the balance of your body's energy centers or chakras, identifying blockages and strengths.

reading.title: AI Tarot Interpretation
reading.description: Generate a personalized reading for your clients.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: Could not get an interpretation from the AI. Please try again.
